Blue-Striped Basculin in Pokémon Black and White has Reckless as its first Ability, while in Pokémon Black 2 and White 2, it has Rock Head instead. In Pokémon White, the Blue-Striped Basculin obtained through in-game trade in Driftveil City has Rock Head.
